name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. James MITCHELL, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. James MITCHELL, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The Petition for Allowance of Appeal filed by James Mitchell is granted. The order of the Superior Court is reversed and the matter is remanded to the Superior Court for disposition of the appeal on the merits. Jurisdiction is relinquished.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
550 A.2d 1009
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. James MITCHELL, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Nov. 30, 1988.
